campusInstructions.title: Campus rescue plans and actions in dangerous situations
campusInstructions.description: The rescue plan contains information on how dangerous situations are prevented, how to prepare for them and how to act in the event of an accident. Ensure your competence in dangerous situations, familiarise yourself with your campus rescue plan and instructions on what to do in dangerous situations.

crisisTeamContact.title: Haaga-Helia‚Äôs preparedness and crisis team
crisisTeamContact.description: Haaga-Helia has a preparedness and crisis team, whose task is to prepare for, and respond to, incidents affecting Haaga-Helia. The aim is to prevent psychological and physical adverse effects, maintain the functioning of the university community and its members, support people's recovery, and strengthen the community and its members' ability to cope with difficult situations.

emergencyApp.title: Download 112 Suomi - app
emergencyApp.description:
Do a safety favor and download the 112 Suomi app. You will get help to the right location in emergency and problem situations. `
`In the app you can also find on-call numbers for non-urgent assistance, and you will receive hazard and authority alerts directly to your phone.

news.title: Haaga-Helia's safety news
news.description: Read newest safety-related news from Haaga-Helia's website.üéâ

rules.title: Rules and regulations
rules.description: üéì The rules and regulations provide information about your rights and responsibilities as a student. The purpose of the rules and regulations is to promote internal order, the smooth running of studies, and the safety and comfort of the university community.

safeHaagaHelia.title: A safe Haaga-Helia
safeHaagaHelia.description: üéì The aim of Haaga-Helias safety work is to ensure that every person on campus feels safe, whether they are working, studying or just visiting. You are for your part contributing to the creation of a safe and comfortable working and learning environment and a thriving Haaga-Helia community. Safety and well-being are achieved more effectively when we work together!
